node.name: Electronic documents in a library
node.description: This example tree decribes requirements for preserving electronic documents in a library setting. It is a draft version that needs revision to be considered useful indeed, but provides a good starting point for refining the criteria. There are no automated measurements defined in this version of the tree.

node.name: Image preservation requirements
node.description: Completely automated requirements tree for preserving image data

property.name: ubiquity of format
property.description: Indicates to which extent this format is used. Refers to http://p2-registry.ecs.soton.ac.uk/pronom/risk_categories/ubiquity/ .. comment

property.name: number of tools:open
property.description: Number of tools that can open objects of this format.

property.name: documentation quality
property.description: Indicates the quality of the format documentation. Refers to http://p2-registry.ecs.soton.ac.uk/pronom/risk_categories/documentation_quality/ .. comment

property.name: disclosure of format
property.description: Indicates the openness of this format. Refers to http://p2-registry.ecs.soton.ac.uk/pronom/risk_categories/disclosure/ .. comment

property.name: format-license:open
property.description: Indicates where there are any rights restrictions. Refers to http://p2-registry.ecs.soton.ac.uk/pronom/risk_categories/rights/open

property.name: stability of format
property.description: Indicates the stability of format. Refers to http://p2-registry.ecs.soton.ac.uk/pronom/risk_categories/stability/ .. comment

property.name: format-license: ipr protected
property.description: Indicates if there exists IPR protection of the format. Refers to http://p2-registry.ecs.soton.ac.uk/pronom/risk_categories/rights/ipr_protected

property.name: format-license: proprietary
property.description: Indicates whether this is a proprietary format. Refers to http://p2-registry.ecs.soton.ac.uk/pronom/risk_categories/rights/proprietary

property.name: complexity of format
property.description: Indicates the complexity of this format. Refers to http://p2-registry.ecs.soton.ac.uk/pronom/risk_categories/complexity/ .. comment

property.name: relative file size
property.description: factor for relative file size, calculated as: (size of result / size of source)

property.name: image similarity
property.description: Quantitative indication of similarity between source and result. A variety of distance metrics for image comparison are available.

metric.name: equal
metric.description: Comparison of two values for equality

property.name: image similarity
property.description: Quantitative indication of similarity between source and result. A variety of distance metrics for image comparison are available.

property.name: image width
property.description: Width of an image, measured in number of pixels on the x-axis.

metric.name: equal
metric.description: Comparison of two values for equality

property.name: image height
property.description: Height of an image, measured in number of pixels on the y-axis.

metric.name: equal
metric.description: Comparison of two values for equality

property.name: image metadata
property.description: Additional metadata stored in images (EXIF, ...)

metric.name: preserved
metric.description: Indicator if all values in source measurement do exist in result measurement

property.name: memory per MB
property.description: Memory used per megabyte of input, measured in megabyte

property.name: time per MB
property.description: Elapsed processing time used per MB, measured in milliseconds

property.name: logging amount
property.description: The amount of logging output produced by a component, measured in the length of characters

property.name: logging format
property.description: The format of logging output produced by a component (currently: none/text/xml)

property.name: throughput
property.description: Processing throughput, measured in megabytes per second

property.name: format valid
property.description: Indicates whether the format of the object is well formed

property.name: format well-formed
property.description: Indicates whether the format of the object is well formed

property.name: format conforms
property.description: Indicates whether the format of the result conforms to the output format specified by the component.
